channel.title: Comments on: YouTube’s Front Page Sucks
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
I agree that playlists suck as well.
And I think starting our own YouTube from your IBM researcher page is a good idea. I think it draws a big crowd.
item.content:encoded:
I agree that playlists suck as well.

And I think starting our own YouTube from your IBM researcher page is a good idea. I think it draws a big crowd.

item.title: By: ariel
item.dc:creator: ariel
item.description:
Here is another one: if you have a playlist which you want to add somewhere (e.g., quicklist), or simply delete, then you can only pick 20 at a time and there is no option to pick *all*.
Maybe we should write our own videotube and design it much better. Then we could share it with our friends, and they would share it to theirs. And then we could put in advertisements, you know, just to cover the financial burden, nothing more.
Check out my new page: https://researcher.ibm.com/researcher/view.php?person=il-ARIELC
(now there is a link to it, lol)
item.content:encoded:
Here is another one: if you have a playlist which you want to add somewhere (e.g., quicklist), or simply delete, then you can only pick 20 at a time and there is no option to pick *all*.

Maybe we should write our own videotube and design it much better. Then we could share it with our friends, and they would share it to theirs. And then we could put in advertisements, you know, just to cover the financial burden, nothing more.
